remarks: Orthocomplement of the zero subspace.  (Contributed by NM, 19-Jun-2014.)
statement:
doch0.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
doch0.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
doch0.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
doch0.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
doch0.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` U ) $.
doch0 $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) -> ( ._|_ ` { .0. } ) = V ) $.
